page.title: 03Life On My Estate
page.content: The estate is tidy where I live but the other side of the estate is a mess with old news-papers scattered around.There is one road going down to a block that stops cars from coming through.My street has three car parks but not many cars use them. In the next street lives an old man. When the boys play football and bang their ball against the fence he comes out and tells them off.They hide round the corner.When small children come out they get excited and shout and scream. Many of the people are elderly and some of them moan at you.One man never has a smile on his face.He walks round with a grumpy expression and if you are noisy he comes out and nags at you.My neighbour gardens nearly every day pulling out weeds and watering her plants.
